meanings.definition: A celestial body that is a precursor to a planet.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the protoplanet to learn more about how planets form.
meanings.sent2: The protoplanet is slowly gathering material to eventually become a full-fledged planet.
meanings.sent3: The protoplanet decided it was tired of being a baby planet and wanted to grow up faster.
meanings.sent4: The protoplanet's journey towards becoming a planet is like a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The protoplanet's future as a planet shines brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A developing planetary body within a solar system.
meanings.sent1: The protoplanet orbits the star at the center of the solar system.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers believe the protoplanet will eventually evolve into a full-fledged planet.
meanings.sent3: The protoplanet threw a party for all the other planets to celebrate its growth spurt.
meanings.sent4: The protoplanet's growth within the solar system is akin to a seed sprouting into a tree.
meanings.sent5: The protoplanet's presence in the solar system is a sign of exciting changes to come.
